award_title: MPS/CHE-EPSRC: Coherent Optical Control of Triplet Spin States in Organic Molecule Quantum Emitters
subject: Making experimental analysis work for others without the back-and-forth
body:
Spectroscopy analysis code that only runs in your environmentâ€”then answering emails about dependencies, parameter files, and "wait, which version?"

Built Ouro to wrap computational workflows in an API so others can reuse methods directly instead of recreating them. Consolidates the code-sharing work you're already doing.

Happy to show you if it's relevant. Around in January after the holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
